data.text: @CJBdingo25 This is very hypocritical if anything is not in and out suit you or contrarary to your point of view is propaganda?

@CJBdingo25 For goodness sake can we just wipe these dogs off the face of the earth they are not human and don’t deserve to breathe our air …the thought they do makes it smell like rotten putrid decaying filth…
@CJBdingo25 Who can say they didnt see this coming a mile away though , it was absolutely bound to happen!
